backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor for the medical imaging application, handling user profiles, CT scan uploads, API configuration, and tumor detection analysis with role-based access control.
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report JSON file with no features listed.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document containing one-sentence summaries of all frontend source files for build planning reference.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS stylesheet defining OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for light and dark theme color tokens including sidebar, chart, and UI component colors.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML entry point for the React app titled 'Medical Imaging Analysis Application' that mounts the app at the root div.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component managing authentication state, profile loading, and conditional rendering of LoginScreen, ProfileSetup, or the main Dashboard with Header and Footer.
Admin-only dialog component for viewing and saving the external AI API endpoint URL and API key, with password masking for the key field.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer component displaying a medical disclaimer about AI-powered imaging analysis being for research and educational purposes.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Sticky application header showing the MediScan AI brand, logged-in user profile info, an admin-only API Config button, and a logout button.
frontend/src/components/LoginScreen.tsx: Login page featuring the MediScan AI branding, three feature highlight cards, and an Internet Identity login button with loading state handling.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: A form component that collects a user's name, department, and specialization, then saves the profile via the `useSaveCallerUserProfile` mutation hook.
frontend/src/components/ScanCard.tsx: Displays a summary card for a single CT scan, showing its image thumbnail, analysis status badge, and tumor detection result if analyzed.
frontend/src/components/ScanDetailDialog: A modal dialog that shows full CT scan details, supports triggering AI tumor analysis, and displays results including tumor stage and mask image in tabbed views.
frontend/src/components/ScansListTab.tsx: Renders a grid of ScanCard components for all uploaded scans, with loading/empty states and a detail dialog on card click.
frontend/src/components/UploadScanTab.ts: Provides a form to upload a CT scan image with a patient ID, shows a preview of the selected file, and submits via the `useUploadScan` mutation hook.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an ICP backend actor using the current Internet Identity, initializing access control and invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and hook for Internet Identity authentication, exposing login/logout functions, identity state, and login status via the DFINITY AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, CT scans, and API configuration (endpoint/key) via the backend actor, with toast notifications for success/error states.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS file that sets up Tailwind base/components/utilities and defines CSS custom properties for light/dark theme colors including a medical-specific color palette using OKLCH.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that renders the React app wrapped in QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Dashboard page component with two tabs—'All Scans' and 'Upload New'—rendering ScansListTab and UploadScanTab respectively.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routes, with sessionStorage persistence support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending the default theme with OKLCH-based color tokens (including medical and sidebar palettes), custom border radii, accordion animations, and typography/container-queries plugins.
project_state.json: Project state metadata describing three pending feature requests: restoring backend API config logic, restoring the frontend ApiConfigDialog and admin header button, and ensuring the Footer omits Caffeine AI branding.
